title: Extra ping from Telstra
body:
Recently I had a very bad ping on oceania server, which had raised like 100ms than before.
I do some analyze the problem a bit and concluded it has nothing to do with my client side.
So I went on speedtest.net to test my ping against each service provide in Sydney.

Everyone of them gives 110~140ms except Telstra, which gives me ~250ms, which I believe is the source of the lag.

Are there any solution to this latency issue? 
Or can any technician tell me what to provide for you guys to help me

Thanks

replies.body:
Weird, I used to run Telstra and I got 30 ping.

If you run any internet trafficking programs like I did uninstall them.
other than that your probably not getting what you paid for and like knuuckles said, just call your provider.
Call up your provider that much Ping is unacceptable
